reviews.text:
Really nice camping site. We hired a van to reach there with our stuff. Van costs SGD 20 per one way. There‚Äôs no signal to phones so it is better to confirm your next day morning pickup too.
You can find plenty of dead woods for fire while roaming around before getting too dark.The view here is really great with sunset. No monkeys seen after 6pm but they came next day early morning.
So avoid showing them plastic bags and smelling food items.
There are cement tables,  sitting areas and logs around fire place to sit.
Some mosquitoes and Ants  came around our huts.
So use insect repellent. Carry mosquito coils with you.
There‚Äôs no drinking water. So make 100% sure to bring drinking water with you.
Washroom is not very well clean. But can be managed.
We brought toilet clean product and toilet brush with us to clean by ourselves before use. üòÉ
If you are lucky can see a 360 view of sky with stars ‚≠êÔ∏è.
We celebrated a birthday there. So it was magical.

The toilet and facility is a bit run down. But it's a quiet campsite. Just remember to be prepared against the hord of mosquitoes, and the monkeys that tend to visit in the early morning and late afternoon.

Did few time camping at here. There are washroom beside. Few tables and bench around. The view here is great. The breeze here give you a cooling feeling. There are two campfire place at this campsite. I did BBQ at the evening and cooking instant noodle in day time. Do rent a bike at the jetty to ride here. Did sh

nice quiet place for camping. you can get nice sunset view here. Good place to detach from work and have some peace , as there is no network here.

Toilet have running water but not portable. its currently better than Endut Senin. As the latter is renovating.

Excellent scenery, toilet, and fire pits. Avoid sleeping in the shade if you don't have a mosquito net. Nearby forest has plenty of deadwood for fire, and a footpath up the river leads to a hut that sells drinks.
